description: Patch Plan for improving stability of /api/update_bank.php

operations.content:
version: '3'
scenarios:
  - name: api_update_bank
    steps:
      - action: update_bank
        input:
          bank_id: 12345
          new_details: {"name": "New Bank", "address": "New Address"}
        expected_output: success
